snippet: “Henry Ossawa Tanner: Modern Spirit,” on view at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, is a gripping exhibition of an African-American painter in search of a race-blind environment.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews paintings by African-American artist Henry Ossawa Tanner at the Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts.
lead_paragraph: “Henry Ossawa Tanner: Modern Spirit,” on view at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, is a gripping exhibition of an African-American painter in search of a race-blind environment.

headline.seo: Henry Ossawa Tanner at Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts
headline.main: An African-American Painter Who Tried to Transcend Race
headline.print_headline: An African-American Painter Who Tried to Transcend Race
